entry.title: New release for Slink: v1.1.0
entry.content:
Wat's New:

  • Add IMAGE_STRIP_EXIF_METADATA option to remove EXIF metadata from images. This is useful for privacy reasons.
  • Add USER_ALLOW_UNAUTHENTICATED_ACCESS option to be able to protect public routes with authentication.
  • Other minor UI improvements.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/andrii-kryvoviaz/slink/compare/v1.0.1...v1.1.0

entry.title: New release for Slink: v1.2.0
entry.content:
What's New

Username Login

  • Introduced a new username field for login.
  • Users can now log in using either their username or email address, adding flexibility to the authentication process.

Display Name Update

  • Users can now update their display name from their profile settings.

Updates

Minor UI Layout Updates

  • Small improvements made to the user interface across the app for a cleaner experience.
  • Changes include tweaks to spacing, button alignment, and typography to improve consistency.

Improved Mobile UI

  • Enhanced mobile responsiveness, offering a smoother experience on smaller devices.

Other Changes

Security Dependencies

  • Bumped dependency versions to address security vulnerabilities and ensure continued stability.

License Update

  • The project license has been changed from MIT to AGPLv3 to ensure the project always remains open source.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/andrii-kryvoviaz/slink/compare/v1.1.0...v1.2.0

entry.title: New release for Slink: v1.3.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

Admin Role Management

  • Command-Line Admin Promotion A new CLI command makes it possible to grant admin privileges directly from the terminal:

bash docker exec -it slink slink user:grant:role --email=<user-email> ROLE_ADMIN

  • Admin Dashboard: An Admin Dashboard now provides an overview of key application metrics, basic user management, and the option to adjust app-wide settings.

Application Settings & Timezone

  • Timezone Configuration: The applicationâ€™s timezone can be configured using an environment variable in the Docker setup, allowing more precise control over date and time handling.

  • Disable User Creation: A new setting allows disabling new user registrations, creating a more controlled-access environment when needed.

Extended Image Format Support

  • HEIC, TIFF, and AVIF The application can now handle HEIC, TIFF, and AVIF images. HEIC and TIFF files are automatically converted to JPEG upon upload for better compatibility.

  • GIF Resize & Animated Image Enhancements Image-processing capabilities have been improved to resize GIFs and better handle animated images.

UI Enhancements

A series of subtle refinements deliver a more cohesive look and feel across the application.

Core Upgrades & Minor Fixes

  • Migration to PHP 8.4, Symfony 7.2, and Svelte 5 Updated platform components leverage new features and performance gains.
  • Security & Dependency Updates Several libraries and dependencies have been upgraded to address security issues and maintain stability.
  • Minor Bug Fixes This release also includes various small fixes to improve overall reliability.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/andrii-kryvoviaz/slink/compare/v1.2.1...v1.3.0
